title: Do we have to confess to people if we have wronged them? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: Asia do I have to confess to people if I did something wrong to them no generally speaking it would lead to more harm than good so don't confess but don't lie so someone says to you did you say so and so against me or about me Dodge the question don't say no I didn't when when actually you did you can say me you kidding how could I say such a thing you didn't say I didn't dodge the question say anything that would allow you to avoid this but
